About.title: About Us
About.description: We take full responsibility for the delivery of your shipment, giving you more time to focus on important matters. Amanati postal and courier service operates throughout Georgia. We are creating a modern, technological, and convenient service for businesses. Our goal is to save our customers time and simplify their daily routine through our service, which ensures the safe and prompt delivery of shipments to their destination.
